name: smith-machine-reverse-calf-raises
title: Smith Machine Reverse Calf Raises
primer: This is a unique exercise that works the tibialis anterior muscle, one of the muscles of the calves.
steps: Place a block or low box under the bar at a Smith Machine.
Stand on the edge of the box with your toes hanging off.
Place the bar across your shoulders and lean forward lifting your ankles off the box.
tips: Use the bar for support as you perform this exercise.
